body:
@timoschilling 

I run

```
bundle update activeadmin
Using activeadmin 1.0.0.pre2 from git://github.com/activeadmin/activeadmin.git (at master@2635bdb)
```

I add some filters to resource i apply them and in sidebar see translated message 
`active_admin.search_status.no_current_filters`

I think this is bug

@groony please post a screenshot, and the query string of the current page.

Did this only start happening after upgrading Active Admin? What version were you using before?

@seanlinsley 
Before commit SHA  `bf29c0e6ac78`
After commit SHA `2635bdb`
Query string `utf8=✓&q%5Bid_equals%5D=333&commit=Фильтровать&order=id_desc`
Yes it starts after upgrading active_admin.

Before: 
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1668362/13730425/f7341f52-e95f-11e5-8826-f431efa5c636.png)

After:
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1668362/13730409/9136f1fc-e95f-11e5-9d4a-12e48076520e.png)
https://github.com/activeadmin/activeadmin/compare/bf29c0e6ac78...2635bdb is a range of 73 commits, can you try each commit in that range to find the one commit how breaks?

Using activeadmin 1.0.0.pre2 from git://github.com/activeadmin/activeadmin.git (at master@e72c62b)

The same issue, search status -> current filters is always set to none, and Scope is :all.

I have this bug too and I know where is this. 

@seanlinsley commited:
https://github.com/activeadmin/activeadmin/commit/4effc7be0f509752eadeb09118f977b05d53399a#diff-282009a178f2f0176aca3b953fdc4406R11 this line.

After call `to_unsafe_h` you have got params Hash like `{"q" => {...} }`, with **string-keys**! But you trying to get `params[:q]` with **symbol-key**, it's everytime is empty.

issue.title: Filters on Index Pages: Current Filters displays 'None' when there is a filter applied

milestone.title: MVP
milestone.description:
MVP version will:

* have updated inventory
* have a functional workflow from intake to disbursement
* not have any major bugs or errors occurring
* satisfy the immediate basic needs of the client for maintaining their inventory

repository.name: pdx_diaper
repository.description: Inventory system for Portland Diaper Bank, created at Ruby For Good 2016

issue.body: Current view: However, "Current Filter" should list the filters that have been applied rather than the word "none". This is an issue across multiple index views (e.g. items, barcodes).

issue.title: Fixes #4342 Corrects missing filter display in #index views, corrects deprecation warning in Kaminari

repository.name: activeadmin
repository.description: The administration framework for Ruby on Rails applications.

issue.body:
Fix was identified by @sletix in #4342 -- used graceful fallthrough to avoid possible conflicts elsewhere. 

I added in a deprecation-fix for Kaminari too -- `total_pages` is new hotness, `num_pages` is old and busted.

body: We should fix this commit https://github.com/activeadmin/activeadmin/commit/4effc7be0f509752eadeb09118f977b05d53399a, `@params` need to be a `ActionController::Parameters` or `ActiveSupport::HashWithIndifferentAccess`. Maybe we don't need to call `to_unsafe_h` in https://github.com/activeadmin/activeadmin/commit/4effc7be0f509752eadeb09118f977b05d53399a#diff-282009a178f2f0176aca3b953fdc4406R11.
When can we get this fixed? The latest version 9ff8f69b035635e82d53c0adb91e8625e5c05cf0 doesn't seem to have the fix :(

If I make this small change.. 

```
diff --git a/lib/active_admin/filters/active.rb b/lib/active_admin/filters/active.rb
index c0d58dd..cff3f28 100644
--- a/lib/active_admin/filters/active.rb
+++ b/lib/active_admin/filters/active.rb
@@ -8,7 +8,7 @@ module ActiveAdmin

       def initialize(resource_class, params)
         @resource_class = resource_class
-        @params = params.respond_to?(:to_unsafe_h) ? params.to_unsafe_h : params
+        @params = ActiveSupport::HashWithIndifferentAccess.new params
         @scope = humanize_scope
         @filters = build_filters
       end
```

I am able to see this... 

![screenshot_304](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/31319/17260479/9d6c8d28-559e-11e6-9580-1551d50a8a27.png)

I can make a PR if someone can merge it.

What am I missing here? How can I debug?
